privacy.introduction: At Vehicles Control Check, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our mobile application.
privacy.information_collection: WE DO NOT COLLECT ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION through our mobile application. User photos, if selected, and entered information are stored on the user's phone or on their own Drive unit if chosen. The username and email during the registration process and subsequent authentication are managed through the Firebase provider, which stores this information according to its own methods.
privacy.information_use: The information collected during the authentication process is used solely to allow you to access the application. We do not share, sell, or use your personal information for any other purpose. No data is logged, analyzed, or otherwise processed.
privacy.information_security: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Authentication is managed by Firebase or Google, which adheres to industry security standards. Information stored on the device or Drive is encrypted for added protection.
privacy.your_rights: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your personal information at any time. To exercise these rights, please contact us through the contact information provided in the app.
privacy.publicity_info: During the use of the app, ads are displayed. We use advertising responsibly to enhance the user experience. There should only be a banner at the bottom, which does not interfere with the use of the app, and a full-screen ad the first time an action is taken during the active session. This advertising is managed by Google. We do not handle any data that could be stored for advertising or any other purposes.
privacy.policy_updates: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy in the app. We recommend that you review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

userterms.presentation: Vehicles Control Check - Terms of Use
userterms.introduction: Welcome to Vehicles Control Check. By using this app, you agree to comply with the following terms of use:
userterms.term1text: This app is designed to help users keep track of vehicle maintenance, breakdowns, and other related events. We do not store any personal data on our servers, except for the authentication process via Firebase.
userterms.term2text: User authentication is performed through Firebase, also allowing access via Google. We do not collect or store personal data.
userterms.term3text: All information recorded in the app is stored locally on the user's device or on Drive if selected. It is the user's responsibility to keep this information secure and make backups if deemed necessary.
userterms.term4text: Vehicles Control Check is not responsible for any damage or data loss resulting from the use of the application.

alert.user_created_success_text: Please check your email to confirm your account (the email might be in your spam/junk folder)
alert.temporarily_disabled: The account has been temporarily disabled for security reasons
alert.temporarily_disabled_text: Invalid data has been entered repeatedly. If you wish to reactivate it immediately, reset your password by clicking RESET PASSWORD, and you will receive an email with a link.

alert.vehicle_erased_text: The vehicle has been successfully deleted
alert.vehicle_permanently_erased: The vehicle and all associated events and notifications will be permanently deleted

alert.file_created_text: The file has been created. You can find it in the 'Documents/vehicles-control' folder on your device or memory card. It is a file with your user number and a '.vcc' extension
alert.file_created_text_csv: The file has been created. You can find it in the 'Documents/vehicles-control' folder on your device or memory card. It is a file with your user number and a '.csv' extension
alert.file_restored_text: The backup has been successfully restored
alert.actual_data_will_be_rewrite: Current data will be replaced by the backup.
alert.no_connected_to_backup_account: Not connected to any backup account

alert.imposible_to_close_session_text: The session cannot be closed because reading, writing, or deletion operations are ongoing in the cloud
alert.no_fished_op_detected_text: An interruption in a Download, Upload, or Drive cleanup operation has been detected. To ensure the integrity of your data in the cloud, you can click 'ACCEPT' and perform an update with the current data from your device.
alert.user_delete_with_exit: The user has been successfully deleted
alert.incorrect_date_text: The reminder date cannot be earlier than the current date
alert.do_you_want?: Do you want to update the data on Drive?
alert.notification_problem_text: A problem has been detected with this reminder, please try editing and saving it again.
alert.files_not_found_text: Do you want to generate a backup on Drive?

mainpage.main_text: You don't have any registered vehicles yet. Create your first one!
mainpage.filter_text: search Events by keyword or date...

userpage.is_not_posibble_to_change_text: Access was made through an external provider (Google). Credentials obtained are used to access the application, but no user or record is created in our systems, so it is not possible to change or delete account data.

notifications.not_allowed_text: Notifications have not been explicitly allowed by the user and must be enabled from the settings
notifications.auto_text: The backup will be updated with every change made in the app
notifications.no_auto_text: The backup must be updated manually from the Backup menu

backup.information_text: To restore a backup on your device, press the 'Download and Restore' button
backup.in_device_text: If you plan to switch devices or want to save a complete copy of your data on it, you can use this method. A file with the '.vcc' extension will be saved in the DOCUMENTS folder of your device or memory card
backup.in_device_text_recovery: To recover the data on your new device, you will need to locate and select the file from your device or memory card again
backup.in_drive_text: By connecting with your Drive account, you can keep your data synchronized automatically or manually. You can change this option from the settings menu. The backup will not be visible in your Drive, avoiding accidental deletion risks.
backup.in_drive_text_recovery: To recover data on your new device, simply press the 'Download and Restore' button
backup.only_referencial_currency_text: No currency conversions are applied; this is for reference purposes only.
backup.associated_account_text: The associated account is a Google account that will be used to back up to Drive and sync with Google Calendar

exportfile.export_text: Press the icon to export the file

popover.is_connected_info: Connected to Drive, but no backup files were found
popover.has_file_info: Connected to Drive and backup files were found
popover.auto_info: Any changes will be automatically saved to Drive, your data is secure!
popover.manual_info: Data is not saved automatically, it must be done manually from the Settings/Update Backup menu
